Class RxStream

A class representing a receive stream. With this class, you can receive samples from your device into provided buffers.

Inheritance
object

Read(nint, uint, int, out StreamResult)

Receive data into an arbitrary memory location referenced by an unmanaged pointer. Minimal validation is performed on input parameters.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Read(nint ptr, uint numElems, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result)
Parameters
Type Name Description
nint ptr

A pointer to the buffer to receive into.
uint numElems

The number of elements (of the stream format's size) in the destination buffer.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.

Read(nint[], uint, int, out StreamResult)

Receive data into arbitrary memory locations referenced by unmanaged pointers. Minimal validation is performed on input parameters except channel count.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Read(nint[] ptrs, uint numElems, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result)
Parameters
Type Name Description
nint[] ptrs

Pointers to the receive buffers.
uint numElems

The number of elements (of the stream format's size) in each destination buffer.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.

Read<T>(Memory<T>, int, out StreamResult)

Receive data from a single channel into an arbitrary memory location.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Read<T>(Memory<T> memory, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result) where T : unmanaged
Parameters
Type Name Description
Memory<T> memory

The buffer to receive into. For complex types, this buffer is interleaved.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the given receive buffer. This type must match the stream's format type.

Read<T>(ref T[], int, out StreamResult)

Receive data from a single channel into a managed C# array.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Read<T>(ref T[] buff, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result) where T : unmanaged
Parameters
Type Name Description
T[] buff

The managed array to receive into. For complex types, this buffer is interleaved.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the underlying destination array. This type must match the stream's format type.
